topic.title: Uninstall the Code Engine Service
topic.shortdesc: Process for uninstalling the Code Engine Service from the HPE Helion Development Platform.

ol.li: Log in to the Helion Code Engine deployer.
Source the Service credentials. source ~/service.osrc

Export User/Project domain names (this example uses 'Default') export OS_PROJECT_DOMAIN_NAME=Default export OS_USER_DOMAIN_NAME=Default export OS_ENDPOINT_TYPE=internalURL export OS_INTERFACE=internal
Source the openstack client source /opt/stack/venv/ansible-helionce-1.0.1/-<date/time stamp>/bin/activate

Set product to delete
PRODUCT="helionci"
Delete Helion Code Engine Ports neutron port-list -F name | grep -iE '('"$PRODUCT"')' | cut -d'|' -f2 | tr -d ' ' | xargs -n1 -I{} neutron port-delete {}
Delete Helion Code Engine floating IPs neutron floatingip-list | grep -E '('"$PORT_IDS_GREP_STRING"')' | cut -d'|' -f2 | tr -d ' ' | xargs -n1 -I{} neutron floatingip-delete {}
Delete Helion Code Engine Control-plane VMs nova list | grep -iE '('"$PRODUCT"')' | cut -d'|' -f2 | tr -d ' ' | xargs -n1 -I{} nova delete {}

Delete Helion Code Engine Routers and Networks neutron router-interface-delete HELIONCI_NET_MGMT_router HELIONCI_NET_MGMT_SUBNET neutron net-delete HELIONCI_NET_MGMT neutron net-delete HELIONCI_NET_BROKER neutron router-delete HelionCI_NET_MGMT_router
Delete Security Groups neutron security-group-list | grep -iE '('"$PRODUCT"')' | cut -d '|' -f2 | tr -d ' ' | xargs -n1 -I{} neutron security-group-delete {}
Delete HelionCE keypairs nova keypair-delete helionce-key nova keypair-delete helionce-shared
Log in to the Helion OpenStack deployer
Source the keystone credentials. source ~/keystone.osrc
Delete Helion Code Engine user from Keystone openstack user delete helionci-swift
Source the service credentials. source ~/service.osrc
Delete Helion Code Engine deployer VM nova delete helionce_deployer
Set product to delete PRODUCT="helionci"
Delete Helion Code Engine images from Glance glance image-list | grep -iE '('"$PRODUCT"')' | cut -d '|' -f2 | tr -d ' ' | xargs -I {} -n1 glance image-delete {}
Delete the helionce-shared keypair. source keystone.osrc
Delete the Helion Code Engine project and user openstack project delete helionce openstack user delete helionce
